european hilt weapons ( epee, saber, rapier ) wanted , don't have to 
be " national treasure but prefer no major damage ready for display 
condition, meaning a wall hanger over the fire place sort of things. No 
modan re-pro, prefer 19th cent. and/or earlier. Will trade those from 
my stocks in japanese sword related items ( if your taste runs towards 
the more " gentle side ", i have woodblock prints, paintings and 
ceramics for trade too ).

p.s.  you can contact me off list ( muramasaiii@... ) or let it all 
hang out in public.............


milt
